title: Timeless Voyage
description: Love isn’t bound by the limits of time…When Roman merchant Kaeso is captured by his wild and beautiful Celtic enemy, he finds he has at last reached the destiny laid out by his past. Anwen pirates off the Coast of Ireland in 67 AD, but when she takes Kaeso as a captive she discovers it is he who has stolen her heart. The pair’s voyage of love spans two lifetimes, but all will be lost unless Kaeso and Anwen. both lovers and enemies, face their past life together and discover a way to stop history from repeating.
author: Cornelia Amiri
